handlers.description: This flow creates new google tasklist and inserts a task into it. Then it updates the status of the task. Finally deletes the tasklist
handlers.name: google_tasks

data.name: google_tasks
data.description: This flow creates new google tasklist and inserts a task into it. Then it updates the status of the task. Finally deletes the tasklist

mapping.output: =string.concat("FLow execution completed. Tasklist '", $activity[POST_tasklist].responseBody.id, "' has been deleted.")

input.message: Something went wrong. Please check your app configuration.

settings.name: google-tasks
settings.description: to authenticate and authorize the user against google cloud tasks api v1 using an OAuth2 mechanism
